languages.text: {n}Порядки на добывающих комплексах немного смягчились — надзирателям строго указали наносить профилактические побои лишь кулаками и ногами, но не шоковыми дубинками, а наказание за невыработку нормы сменили с жестокой децимации на гуманное лишение пайка. Каторжане возрадовались.{/n}

{n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the overseers were strictly instructed not to use their electric batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Порядки на добывающих комплексах немного смягчились — надзирателям строго указали наносить профилактические побои лишь кулаками и ногами, но не шоковыми дубинками, а наказание за невыработку нормы сменили с жестокой децимации на гуманное лишение пайка. Каторжане возрадовались.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the wardens were strictly instructed to not use the electrical batons during the preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the punishment for not fulfilling the quota replaced the cruel decimation with the humane deprivation of rations. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

{n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the wardens were strictly instructed to not use the electrical batons during the preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the punishment for not fulfilling the quota replaced the cruel decimation with the humane deprivation of rations. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

{n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the wardens were strictly instructed not to use their electric batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

{n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the wardens were strictly instructed not to use their electric batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

{n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the overseers were strictly instructed not to use their electric batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

languages.text: {n}矿井的惩罚措施稍微放宽了些。看守得到了严格命令，在进行预防性殴打的时候不得使用电棍，只能使用拳头和脚。而对于那些未能完成配额的凡人，惩罚方式从残忍的屠杀被换成了人道的剥夺口粮，所有囚犯都为此欢欣雀跃。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the wardens were strictly instructed not to use their electric batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}矿井的惩罚措施稍微放宽了些。看守得到了严格命令，在进行预防性殴打的时候不得使用电棍，只能使用拳头和脚。而对于那些未能完成配额的凡人，惩罚方式从残忍的屠杀被换成了人道的剥夺口粮，所有囚犯都为此欢欣雀跃。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las normas de las instalaciones mineras se han relajado un poco: los vigilantes recibieron instrucciones estrictas de no utilizar sus porras eléctricas durante las palizas preventivas, solo los puños y los pies. Y la cruel práctica de la diezma fue sustituida por la privación humana de raciones como castigo por no cumplir la cuota. Los presos se alegraron.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the wardens were strictly instructed not to use their electric batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las normas de las instalaciones mineras se han relajado un poco: los vigilantes recibieron instrucciones estrictas de no utilizar sus porras eléctricas durante las palizas preventivas, solo los puños y los pies. Y la cruel práctica de la diezma fue sustituida por la privación humana de raciones como castigo por no cumplir la cuota. Los presos se alegraron.{/n}

languages.text: {n}鉱山施設の規則は少し緩和された...看守らは予防目的で殴打する際に、電気バトンを使用してはならず...拳と足のみを使用するよう、厳しく指示された。そして、残酷な断食は、ノルマを達成できなかった場合の罰としての人道的な配給没収に変更された。受刑者たちは喜んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the wardens were strictly instructed not to use their electric batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鉱山施設の規則は少し緩和された...看守らは予防目的で殴打する際に、電気バトンを使用してはならず...拳と足のみを使用するよう、厳しく指示された。そして、残酷な断食は、ノルマを達成できなかった場合の罰としての人道的な配給没収に変更された。受刑者たちは喜んだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le règlement de la mine se relâche un peu, les gardiens recevant des instructions strictes leur interdisant d'utiliser leurs matraques électriques de manière préventive, et de privilégier pour cela les poings et les pieds. En cas de manquement aux quotas imposés, la pratique discutable des mises à mort systématiques est remplacée par des privations de rations, jugées plus humaines. Les détenus s'en réjouissent largement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rules of the mining facilities have been relaxed a bit — the wardens were strictly instructed not to use their electric batons during preventive beatings — only their fists and feet. And the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le règlement de la mine se relâche un peu, les gardiens recevant des instructions strictes leur interdisant d'utiliser leurs matraques électriques de manière préventive, et de privilégier pour cela les poings et les pieds. En cas de manquement aux quotas imposés, la pratique discutable des mises à mort systématiques est remplacée par des privations de rations, jugées plus humaines. Les détenus s'en réjouissent largement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Regeln in den Minen wurden etwas gelockert: Die Wärter erhielten strikte Anweisung, auf keinen Fall ihre Elektroschocker für präventive Prügel einzusetzen — sondern nur ihre Fäuste und Füße. Und die grausame Praxis der Dezimierung wurde als Strafe für eine Untererfüllung der Quoten abgeschafft und durch eine humane Streichung von Rationen ersetzt. Die Sträflinge jubelten.{/n}

And the cruel practice of decimation was replaced with humane deprivation of rations as punishment for not fulfilling the quota. The convicts rejoiced.{/n}

Und die grausame Praxis der Dezimierung wurde als Strafe für eine Untererfüllung der Quoten abgeschafft und durch eine humane Streichung von Rationen ersetzt. Die Sträflinge jubelten.{/n}
